course_description: This course equips students with the mathematical techniques and understanding needed prior to taking the core Ph.D. sequence in microeconomic theory, macroeconomics, and econometrics. Topics include linear algebra, topology, advanced calculus, and optimization theory.
schedule_location:
MTWThF 9am-1pm in Rich Building 108
MTWThF 2pm-4pm in Rich Building 108
